content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Copper plate factory
No structures found

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab
Consists of lab at position (not specified)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drill
-  Ensure burner mining drill has sufficient fuel before starting the drill
-  Make sure to place the burner mining drill near the resource to be mined

### Errors when using furnace
-  Ensure furnace has sufficient fuel and ingredients before starting the smelting process
-  Make sure to place the furnace near the resource to be smelted

### Errors when using boiler
-  Ensure boiler has sufficient fuel before starting the boiler
-  Make sure to place the boiler near the steam engine

### Errors when using offshore pump
-  Ensure offshore pump is placed near a water source
-  Make sure to connect the offshore pump to the boiler using pipes

### Errors when using steam engine
-  Ensure steam engine is connected to the boiler using pipes
-  Make sure to place the steam engine near the boiler

### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure burner inserter has sufficient fuel before starting the inserter
-  Make sure to place the burner inserter near the chest and the small electric pole

### Errors when using small electric pole
-  Ensure small electric pole is connected to the electricity group
-  Make sure to place the small electric pole near the burner inserter and the chest

### Errors when using pipe group
-  Ensure pipe group is connected to the fluid system
-  Make sure to place the pipe group near the boiler and the offshore pump

### Errors when using electricity group
-  Ensure electricity group is connected to the small electric pole
-  Make sure to place the small electric pole near the burner inserter and the chest
